rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 6 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 6:40 PM, 22 June 2025(Sunday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Quezon, Laguna, Bataan, Pampanga, Nueva Ecija, Rizal, Metro Manila and Bulacan within the next 2 hours.



Intense to torrential rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are being experienced in Tarlac(Tarlac City, San Jose, Santa Ignacia, Gerona, Mayantoc, Camiling, Paniqui, Moncada, Capas), Batangas(Lemery, Agoncillo, Laurel, Calaca, San Nicolas, Taal, Santa Teresita, Batangas City, Alitagtag, Cuenca, Mataasnakahoy, Balete, Lipa, Balayan, Nasugbu), Cavite(Alfonso, Tagaytay, Mendez, Indang, General Emilio Aguinaldo) and Zambales(San Marcelino, Castillejos, Subic) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
